job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAre you a Leadlevel Software Engineer looking for a ltstronggthandsonltstronggt role with a growing company Are you currently working with ltstronggtJava on the backendltstronggt and ltstronggtmodern JavaScript for UI ltstronggtDevelopment Would you like to work with the most cuttingedge technologies for up to ltstronggt170K Salary a 10 bonus and UNLIMITED PTO per yearltstronggt ltpgtltpgtThen keep reading ltpgtltpgtOur client is a unique and innovative organization who have a fantastic opportunity for a Lead Software Engineer to join their expanding team You will be empowered to use your creativity and flair to make a real difference from your first day ltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat youll need ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtFULL STACK capability  both front and backend experienceltligtltligtMust be hands on with Java8ltligtltligtWorked with JavaScript in the last yearltligtltligtExperience with React and or AngularltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat youll get in return ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtUp to 170K Salaryltligtltligt10 annual bonus  for all your hard workltligtltligt401K planltligtltligtPrivate healthcare planltligtltligtCompany stock options availableltligtltligtUnlimited remote workingltligtltligtUNLIMITED PTO per yearltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat to do next ltstronggtltpgtltpgtApply directly via the link below or send me a message on LinkedIn ampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
